column2: I asked for a sandwich rec at the counter
column3: and was recommended The Shrimp because "it changed my life." I ordered the sandwich and a hot chocolate to go and was planning to wait until actual lunchtime to eat
column4: but the sandwich just looked too good. However
column5: it will hold up for awhile if you need to transport your lunch! I was in and out of the shop in about 10 minutes
